name: Paul Hannon Jr.
descriptions: Paul Hannon Jr. or Paul Hannon II Paul is a member of the Tunnel Snakes in 2277.
He is the only child of Paul Hannon Sr. and Vikki Hannon. Butch DeLoria, Freddie Gomez, and Wally Mack are his friends and fellow gang members.
The other Tunnel Snakes sometimes tease him because of his father being the chief of security in Vault 101, but this also gives him a certain cachet among his friends, though.

On July 13, 2268, Paul attends the Lone Wanderer's tenth birthday party. In a conversation with the Lone Wanderer, Paul expresses his disappointment that he did not have a Pip-Boy 3000 yet. Later, at the party, Paul ponders possible names for their gang with his two friends.

On August 3, 2274, Paul and his friends are harassing Amata Almodovar. The Lone Wanderer can side with Amata, side with the Tunnel Snakes, or leave Amata with the Tunnel Snakes. When he is informed that his answers in the G.O.A.T. exam determines his career as an engineer, he is relieved with this news.

During the factional crisis in Vault 101, Freddie Gomez informs the Lone Wanderer that Paul died from severe wounds, sustained during the radroach attack, and would have survived if there had been a doctor in the vault.
Paul can also be found in Vault 106, as a hallucination in his Tunnel Snake outfit (along with the rest of the Tunnel Snakes) during the fight with the survivor in the lowest level of the vault.
